roi_calculation: Critical - Enables CI/CD and rapid regression testing for core flows.
infrastructure_setup: CI/CD integration, Test environment setup with mocks, Test data seeding scripts.
success_metrics: 90% of core user stories have E2E test coverage; CI pipeline runs in < 15 mins.
risk_factors: Mobile E2E automation flakiness; steep learning curve for Pact.
mitigation_strategies: Use a device farm for mobile tests; dedicated training sessions for contract testing.
business_value: Accelerate time-to-market for MVP by enabling confident, frequent releases.

roi_calculation: High - Prevents production performance and security incidents.
infrastructure_setup: Dedicated performance testing environment; Integration of DAST tools into CI.
success_metrics: Key APIs meet performance benchmarks; No critical vulnerabilities found pre-release.
risk_factors: Difficulty in creating realistic load profiles; false positives from security scanners.
mitigation_strategies: Analyze production traffic to model load tests; manual triage of security findings.
business_value: Ensure platform stability, scalability, and security as user base grows.
